title: AlignType
content:
{
    "title": "AlignType",
    "description": "",
    "content": "This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: AlignType
type: enum
summary: |
  An enum that specifies how the constraint will attempt to align the body
  associated with the constraint.
description: |
  An enum that specifies how the constraint will attempt to align the body
  associated with the constraint and attachment. Depending on the configuration,
  it can be used to align specific axes to be parallel, perpendicular, or to
  look at a specific point.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Parallel
    summary: ''
    value: 0
    tags:
      - Deprecated
    deprecationmessage: |
      Use PrimaryAxisParallel instead.
  - name: Perpendicular
    summary: ''
    value: 1
    tags:
      - Deprecated
    deprecationmessage: |
      Use PrimaryAxisPerpendicular instead.
  - name: PrimaryAxisParallel
    summary: |
      Aligns the primary axis to be parallel to the axis given by
      Class.Constraint.Attachment1.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: PrimaryAxisPerpendicular
    summary: |
      Aligns the primary axis to be perpendicular to the axis given by
      Class.Constraint.Attachment1.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: PrimaryAxisLookAt
    summary: |
      Aligns the primary axis to look at the point given by
      Class.Constraint.Attachment1 or the
      Class.AlignOrientation.LookAtPosition.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: AllAxes
    summary: |
      Aligns all of the axes of Class.Constraint.Attachment0 to the axes given
      by Class.Constraint.Attachment1 or to the target orientation provided by
      Class.AlignOrientation.PrimaryAxis and
      Class.AlignOrientation.SecondaryAxis.
    value: 5
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''",
    "source": "AlignType.yaml"
}
